SYSTEM: 01_RDF%28S%29.pdf: Página 25
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
25
RDF and RDF Schema
RDF (and other W3C Recommendations) and URIs
•
A set of URIs is sometimes known as a vocabulary
–
The RDF Vocabulary 
•
The set of URIs used to describe the RDF concepts: rdf:Property, 
rdf:Resource, rdf:type, etc.
–
The RDFS Vocabulary 
•
The set of URIs used in describing RDF Schema: rdfs:Class, rdfs:domain, 
etc.
–
The ‘Person’ Vocabulary 
• person:hasColleague, person:Person, person:Employee, etc.
oeg:Oscar
oeg:Asun
oeg:Raúl
“http://www.fi.upm.es/”
person:hasHomePage
“Oscar Corcho García”
